channel.title: Making spec gfx hit the player and npc

item.title: Making spec gfx hit the player and npc
item.dc:creator: @pkinnubpk pkinnubpk
item.description:
@pkinnubpk wrote:

Im adding zammy gs spec, (barrage) and i want the barrage to hit the player and freeze them, how do i do this?
Here is my zammy gs spec atm i need barrage gfx aswell.

if (playerEquipment[playerWeapon] == 15336 && specialAmount >= 50) { ProjectileSpec(282, absY, absX, offsetY, offsetX, AttackingOn, EnemyY, EnemyX); calculateSpecial(); hitDiff = specialDamage; usingSpecial = false; specialDamage = 0; specialDamage2 = 0; }

Read full topic
item.source: Making spec gfx hit the player and npc
